name: Organization for European Integration Change
goal: Our organization deals with the integration process of Kosovo towards the EU. The main activities focus on the sensibilisation of young people for the benefits of being part of the EU. The organization also publishes studies made at the local level, mainly in schools, for the knowledge of the population on EU matters.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Single market, Youth
euInitiatives: The main pilicies followed by our organization are the EU neghboring policy, foreign relations and the funding for education. Currently we are also covering the process of the visa liberalization for Kosovo.
